1.Card Activation:
Title: "Activating Your Card"
Description: This knowledge article provides step-by-step instructions for activating your new card:
Via Phone: Call our dedicated activation line at [insert phone number] from your registered phone number.
Through Online Banking: Log in to your online banking account and navigate to the "Card Services" or "Manage Cards" section. Select the option to activate your card and follow the prompts.
At an ATM: Insert your card into any bank ATM and follow the on-screen instructions for activation.
By Contacting Customer Support: If you encounter any issues during the activation process, please contact our customer support team for assistance.
2.Card Replacement:
Title: "Requesting a Card Replacement"
Description: If your card is damaged, lost, or stolen, you can request a replacement card by following these steps:
Report the Issue: Immediately report the lost, stolen, or damaged card to our customer support team either through our hotline or via online banking.
Verification: For security purposes, you may be asked to verify your identity before a replacement card can be issued.
Delivery: Once your request is processed, your replacement card will be delivered to the address on file within [insert timeframe].
Activation: Upon receiving your replacement card, follow the activation instructions provided in the previous knowledge article.
If you suspect fraudulent activity on your lost or stolen card, please inform our customer support team immediately.
3.Card Lost or Stolen:
Title: "Reporting a Lost or Stolen Card"
Description: If your card is lost or stolen, it's important to take immediate action to prevent unauthorized use. Follow these steps:
Report the Loss: Contact our customer support team immediately to report the loss or theft of your card. This helps prevent unauthorized transactions.
Card Block: Request to block your lost or stolen card to prevent any further transactions.
Verification: For security purposes, you may be asked to verify your identity and provide details about the lost or stolen card.
Replacement: Once the loss is reported, you can follow the steps outlined in the "Replacement" knowledge article to request a replacement card.
Remember to monitor your account for any unauthorized transactions and report them promptly to our customer support team.
